Text:
While I do appreciate your work and thank your for it. I would comment on the file size of the screens. At 618 KB for each image they are huge. It would be great if you could get the size down to a reasonable resolution. 72kb id the average screen resolution and would load much faster.

thanks again

I think the file size is just fine. I like seeing large images. It shows more details as to whether I want to download or not. 614 kb size images shouldn't be a problem if you have a broadband connection.
